Class SQLightable.Reflection.ColumnMap<ST extends SQLightable>

    SQLightable.Reflection<T extends SQLightable>

    public static class SQLightable.Reflection.ColumnMap<ST extends SQLightable>
extends java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.reflect.Field,SQLightable.Reflection.Column>
    Provides a syntactic shorthand for working with maps of fields to column reflections.
    Since:
    zer0bandwidth-net/android 0.1.7 (#50)

    • Method Detail

      • getColumnsAsList

        public java.util.List<SQLightable.Reflection.Column> getColumnsAsList()
        Deprecated. zer0bandwidth-net/android 0.2.1 (#56) — don't rely on this method to get an array of columns; use SQLightable.Reflection.getColumns() instead.
        Returns the ordered set of column reflections as a list. This is provided because using the standard LinkedHashMap.values() method seems to confuse the compiler when used in contexts where the generic type parameter might be erased.
        Returns:
        a list of column reflections
